description: This file defines a Flask route for performing a health check endpoint. It uses Flask-Smorest's Blueprint and Flask's MethodView to create a GET endpoint returning a health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask view class that implements a health check endpoint, responding with a simple health status message.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check endpoint, returning a JSON object indicating healthy status.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route")$/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route")
